title: For Sale: Nine T3 Turkey Reds (w/ scans)
author: OldOriole

posts.post_title: For Sale: Nine T3 Turkey Reds (w/ scans)
posts.post_content:
Offered for sale are nine individual T3 Turkey Red cards.  Each card has been graded by PSA.  Please reply or email (oldorioles@aol.com) with any questions or interest.  Update:  Scans have now been added.  Thank you, Dave.  The cards and prices are as follow:

Wiltse (PSA 2.5) - $260
Schulte (PSA 2.5) - $260
Chase (PSA 2) - $270
Walsh (PSA 2MK) - $240
'Out at Third' (PSA 2.5) - $225
Lennox (PSA 2) - $225
Murray (PSA 2) - $225
Niles (PSA 2) - $225
Elberfeld (PSA 2MK) - SOLD
